name: scripts-cli
description: CLI Manager for Ticket Tracking System scripts

scripts.tts:frontend: node index.js run services tts frontend
scripts.tts:ticket: node index.js run services tts ticket
scripts.tts:workflow: node index.js run services tts workflow
scripts.tts:workflow-worker: node index.js run services tts workflow-worker
scripts.tts:messaging: node index.js run services tts messaging
scripts.tts:notification: node index.js run services tts notification
scripts.tts:notification-worker: node index.js run services tts notification-worker
scripts.hdts:backend: node index.js run services hdts backend
scripts.hdts:worker: node index.js run services hdts worker
scripts.hdts:frontend: node index.js run services hdts frontend

author: MAP Team
